description:
Jerry oozes sensuality and sexuality. His dark looks and almost runic tattoos create an ethereal effect. He has dense, almost black eyes with eyelashes that enter a room long before he does.
He's of Latin descent, and sports a rather large, newly uncut penis (apparently the girls were complaining?!? What the fuck?)
His video is awesome. Ya know, I have shot close to 300 videos, and his was the first that I was actually tempted to lick up his cum. It just looked..uh..tasty!
title: Jerry Knight - Solo
